snippet: After more than a week of not taking questions from the news media, Mitt Romney steps before the cameras.
abstract: After more than a week of not taking questions from the news media, Mitt Romney steps before the cameras.
lead_paragraph: HUDSON, N.H. - After more than a week of not taking questions from his press corps, and after two days of back-to-back comments that his campaign has scrambled to explain, Mitt Romney stepped to the microphone after an event at metal fabricating plant here Monday afternoon, and sought to clarify remarks he has made about fearing the "pink slip" in his private sector career, as well as his statement earlier in the day that he likes "being able to fire" people or businesses that provide poor service.

headline.main: Romney Seeks to Clarify 'Pink Slip' Remarks
